title: China's Xi to participate in G20 leaders' summit via video link
content:
1. China's Xi to participate in G20 leaders' summit via video link  Reuters
  2. Start your day here: Biden's plan to push the spending bill forward; the latest in the 'Rust' shooting; NPR's Halloween favorites  NPR

localize.title: 中国の習近平氏、G20首脳会議にビデオリンクで参加
中国的习近平将通过视频连接参加G20领导人峰会
中國的習近平將通過視頻連接參加G20領導人峯會
